title: Alphonse Mouzon - Mind Transplant (1975) Tommy Bolin [FLAC]
description:

Drummer Alphonse Mouzon cut some of the hardest, heaviest fusion albums ever to hit the Blue Note label in the 70s Ã¢â‚¬â€œ including this legendary powerhouse of a record! The set features Mouzon with one of his longtime partners Ã¢â‚¬â€œ guitarist Tommy Bolin Ã¢â‚¬â€œ hitting a hard-rocking, heavy fusion sound that really blows off the roof Ã¢â‚¬â€œ more than enough influence from the younger generation to showcase the new energy hitting electric jazz Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and a bit like some of the work that Alphonse would do with other artists in later years! Mouzon's drums explode like a case of dynamite hitting a nitroglycerine factory Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and Bolin wails away on guitar like a buzzsaw out of control. There's some nice little licks on the set Ã¢â‚¬â€œ making the record a good one for the sample crowd Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and a really high octane album with loads of nice changes! Titles include "Nitroglycerin", "Mind Transplant", "Snow Bound", "Ascorbic Acid", and "Carbon Dioxide".
